languages.text: "Разве мон-кай не считают, что тяготы закаляют? Ты можешь использовать меня как точильный камень для своего духа, но нечистоты речей впредь оставляй при себе".
"Don't mon-keigh believe that hardship brings fortitude? Use me as a whetstone for your spirit if you wish, but keep your impure speech to yourself from now on."
languages.original_text: "Разве мон-кай не считают, что тяготы закаляют? Ты можешь использовать меня как точильный камень для своего духа, но нечистоты речей впредь оставляй при себе".

traits.locale_text: "Don't mon-keigh believe that hardship brings fortitude? Use me as a whetstone for your spirit if you wish, but keep your impure speech to yourself from now on."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Don't mon-keigh believe that hardship brings fortitude? Use me as a whetstone for your spirit if you wish, but keep your impure speech to yourself from now on."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “难道猴子不认为苦难会砥砺心灵吗？如果你愿意的话，你可以把我当作你心灵的磨刀石，但从今以后，不要再说出这种肮脏的话。”
languages.original_text: "Don't mon-keigh believe that hardship brings fortitude? Use me as a whetstone for your spirit if you wish, but keep your impure speech to yourself from now on."

traits.locale_text: “难道猴子不认为苦难会砥砺心灵吗？如果你愿意的话，你可以把我当作你心灵的磨刀石，但从今以后，不要再说出这种肮脏的话。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « N'est-il pas commun chez les mon-keigh de croire que l'adversité renforce le caractère ? Servez-vous donc de moi comme de pierre à aiguiser pour votre esprit si ça vous chante, mais dorénavant, je vous prierai de m'épargner vos discours impurs. »
languages.original_text: "Don't mon-keigh believe that hardship brings fortitude? Use me as a whetstone for your spirit if you wish, but keep your impure speech to yourself from now on."

traits.locale_text: « N'est-il pas commun chez les mon-keigh de croire que l'adversité renforce le caractère ? Servez-vous donc de moi comme de pierre à aiguiser pour votre esprit si ça vous chante, mais dorénavant, je vous prierai de m'épargner vos discours impurs. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Los mon-keigh no creéis que las dificultades dan fuerza? Pues úsame como piedra para afilar tu espíritu si quieres, pero ahórrame esas palabras impuras».
languages.original_text: "Don't mon-keigh believe that hardship brings fortitude? Use me as a whetstone for your spirit if you wish, but keep your impure speech to yourself from now on."

traits.locale_text: «¿Los mon-keigh no creéis que las dificultades dan fuerza? Pues úsame como piedra para afilar tu espíritu si quieres, pero ahórrame esas palabras impuras».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイは苦難が忍耐を育むとは思わないのか？望みとあらば、あなたの精神を磨く砥石に私を使うがいい。ただし今後はその汚れた言葉を内に封じておけ」
languages.original_text: "Don't mon-keigh believe that hardship brings fortitude? Use me as a whetstone for your spirit if you wish, but keep your impure speech to yourself from now on."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイは苦難が忍耐を育むとは思わないのか？望みとあらば、あなたの精神を磨く砥石に私を使うがいい。ただし今後はその汚れた言葉を内に封じておけ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Glauben Chem-Pan-Sey denn nicht daran, dass aus Mühsal Stärke erwächst? Nutzt mich als Schleifstein für Euren Geist, wenn Ihr wollt, doch behaltet Eure unreinen Worte in Zukunft für Euch."
languages.original_text: "Don't mon-keigh believe that hardship brings fortitude? Use me as a whetstone for your spirit if you wish, but keep your impure speech to yourself from now on."

traits.locale_text: "Glauben Chem-Pan-Sey denn nicht daran, dass aus Mühsal Stärke erwächst? Nutzt mich als Schleifstein für Euren Geist, wenn Ihr wollt, doch behaltet Eure unreinen Worte in Zukunft für Euch."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Don't mon-keigh believe that hardship brings fortitude? Use me as a whetstone for your spirit if you wish, but keep your impure speech to yourself from now on."

languages.text: "Mon-keighler, zorlukların metanet kazandırdığına inanmıyor muydu? İstersen beni ruhunu sertleştiren bir bileği taşı olarak gör ama bu kirli laflarını kendine sakla, bir daha duymayayım."
languages.original_text: "Don't mon-keigh believe that hardship brings fortitude? Use me as a whetstone for your spirit if you wish, but keep your impure speech to yourself from now on."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keighler, zorlukların metanet kazandırdığına inanmıyor muydu? İstersen beni ruhunu sertleştiren bir bileği taşı olarak gör ama bu kirli laflarını kendine sakla, bir daha duymayayım."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
